name: Charging Ram Stance
desc: You are a creature in constant, deadly motion, slamming into foes time and time again.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you hit with a [_Body_] Attack during a [_Breach_] Move.
effect: Once per _Turn_, when you _Push_ during a [_Breach_] Move you may immediately move an equal number of spaces towards the target of the _Push_, taking the shortest possible path. This movement is [_Rush_, _Breach_] and does not count against your _Movement_.
special: You have +1 _Guard_ while you are in the middle of [_Breach_] Movement. Whenever you move through a _Prone_ creature's space with [_Breach_] Movement or knock a creature _Prone_ while in their space due to [_Breach_] Movement, inflict _Vulnerable_ 1.

name: Crashing Stone Stance
desc: You are a true master of boulder-based combat, flinging them with brutal efficiency.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you deal Damage with an _Earthen_ Obstacle (such as with _Shifting Stone_).
effect: You may use _Shifting Stone_ as many times as you wish in a _Round_. Additionally, whenever you move a Size 1 _Earthen_ _Obstacle_ (either as a part of an ability or by using its _Interact_) you may choose to turn the _Obstacle_ into a _Boulder_ prior to resolving any other effects.

name: Cunning Fox Stance
desc: You fight with guile and trickery, pushing every possible advantage to better strike down your foes.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you have _Advantage_ on a  _Light_/_Versatile_ _Attack_ or make a  _Light_/_Versatile__Attack_ against an _Enraged_ or _Exposed_ foe.
effect: After making a _Light_/_Versatile_ _Attack_ against a creature you may convert up to 3 of their _Exposed_/_Enraged_ to _Reeling_ if you had _Advantage_.
special: Deal +1 _Damage_ against creatures with _Enraged_/_Exposed_ when making _Light_/_Versatile_ Attacks.

name: Dripping Veil Stance
desc: The water is a constant shield for you, warding you from all harm.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 1 _Momentum_ when an _Attack_ against you or an ally is _Obstructed_ by a _Water Veil_, you successfully use _Shielding Wave_ on an ally, or an ally is attacked on _Watery_ Terrain that they treat as _Fortified_ due to one of your abilities.
effect: You may ignore _Watery_ _Terrain_ effects of your choice and treat all _Watery_ _Terrain_ as _Fortified_.
special: Once per Round you may use _Shielding Wave_ for no cost, do not gain _Reeling_ from using it, and may freely use the Boost.

name: Guiding Shepard Stance
desc: You guide friends and foes alike across the battlefield, herding their movements.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 3 _Momentum_ when you inflict _Forced Movement_ on an ally.
effect: Whenever you inflict _Forced Movement_ on an ally or grant a _Free Turn_ where they _Move_ you may gift them 1 _Momentum_.
special: At _Respite_ one adjacent ally may Move 1. Additionally, _Sheparding Strike_ has no cost when targeting an ally.

name: Greedy Rodent Stance
desc: You are an armory of the impromptu, finding weapons in the least likely of places.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when an ally uses an _Improvised Weapon_ that you placed.
effect: At _Respite_ you may place a single _Weapon_ as if you rolled a 6 on _Eyes of Greed_.
special: You do not need the requisite _Open Hands_ to _Wield_ an _Improvised Weapon_, but must make an Attack with it by the end of the current _Turn_ when _Wielded_ in this way.

name: Floating Butterfly Stance
desc: You are constantly in motion, shifting across the battlefield with unparalleled grace.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 1 _Momentum_ when you move at least 6 spaces in a _Turn_.
special: Whenever you would [_Safe_] Move you may remove [_Safe_] to _Refresh_ your _Reflex_.

name: Furious Bison Stance
desc: You dominate the battlefield with wide, sweeping strikes, moving forward with constant rage.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, you may remove up to 3 _Enraged_ when you make a _Charged Attack_ to gain an equivalent amount of _Momentum_.
effect: Whenever you begin _Charging_, you may choose to do so in a reckless fashion. If you do, gain 2 _Vigor_. Unless you take Damage before resolving the effect, gain a +1 _Bonus_ when resolving the effect or 1 _Momentum_.

name: Pack Leader Stance
desc: You are a cunning commander, creating openings for allies and helping them exploit them.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when your ally _Hits_+ with an _Attack_ on a _Free Turn_ you granted them.
effect: While in this _Stance_, reduce the cost of _Flank_ and _Pack Punishment_ by 1. Whenever you successfully use one of these _Manuevers_, inflict _Vulnerable_ 1 before resolving the attack.
special: Allies may remove an additional _Vulnerable_ whenever attacking a creature that is adjacent to you or that you have used _Flank_ and _Pack Punishment_ on this _Turn_.

name: Proud Osprey Stance
desc: You excel in a one on one battle, keeping your foe locked against you at every turn.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you damage a creature _Marked_ by you when neither you nor the Target are adjacent to any other creatures.
effect: Deal +1/2 Damage with _Minor_/_Major_ Attacks against creatures you have _Marked_ when no other creatures are adjacent to either of you.
special: You may only have a single creature _Marked_ at any given time; if you would inflict _Marked_ when you already have a creature _Marked_ you must either remove _Marked_ from the original creature or inflict nothing. Treat your _Reeling_ as half its value when triggering _Reactions_ against your _Marked_ target.

name: Patient Hunter Stance
desc: You focus your attention on a singular creature, finding the perfect opening to take them down.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 2 _Momentum_ when you _Defeat_ or _Crit_ on a foe with _Insight_.
effect: On the start of any of your _Turns_ you may choose to gain _Hobbled_ 1. If you do, you may immediately inflict _Insight_ 1 on a creature within Range 12.
special: Whenever you make a _Ranged_ Attack against a creature with _Insight_, you may remove 1 _Insight_ to immediately inflict _Exposed_ 1. Resolve this effect before making the _Attack Roll_.

name: Roaring Lion Stance
desc: You are a bombastic and inspiring warrior, leading your allies as you fight.
accumulate: Once per _Round_ gain 1 _Momentum_ when you inflict _Marked_ or _Enraged_ on a foe.
effect: Gain _Vigor_ equal to 1 + the number of creatures you have _Marked_ at _Respite_.
special: Whenever a _Marked_ creature attacks you, you may gain _Courageous_ 1 or grant _Courageous_ 1 to an ally within Range 3.

name: Rousing Songbird Stance
desc: You are a font of positivity, inspiring allies forward to fight ever harder.
accumulate: Once per _Round_ gain 2 _Momentum_ when you grant _Courageous_/_Joyful_.
effect: Allies treat you as adjacent for the purposes of _Joyful_ when they are within Range 3 of you. Allies within this Range may remove 2 _Joyful_ rather than 1 when they end their _Turn_ within this area, gaining the effects of both.
special: Allies within _Range_ 3 of you may remove 1 _Courageous_/_Joyful_ at any time to gain 1 _Fleeting_ _Poise_. They may only use this ability once per Turn.

name: Stalwart Bastion Stance
desc: You are an unwavering guard, defending your allies against all slights.
accumulate: Once per _Round_, gain 1 _Momentum_ when you grant an ally _Vigor_ or use a _Reaction_ with a _Reeling_ cost on their behalf.
special: Once per Round when an adjacent ally is Attacked you may immediately swap spaces with them. You become the target of the Attack. If the Attack had an _Area_ and your ally is no longer in it they are no longer a target; otherwise, add [_Glancing_]. Inflict _Marked_ on the Attacker.

name: Watching Owl Stance
desc: You keep a keen eye on the battlefield, providing opportunities and openings to all allies.
accumulate: Once per _Round_ when you remove _Insight_ from a creature, gain 1 _Momentum_.
effect: You may remove 2 _Insight_ per _Turn_ rather than one. Whenever you remove the last _Insight_ on a creature, inflict _Vulnerable_ 1.
special: At _Respite_, choose yourself or an ally within Range 4. The target may immediately Move 1. Any creature with _Insight_ treats this Movement as [_Safe_]..
